word_mean: 演示太阳系内大天体运动的仪器。1706年，英国格雷厄姆(G.Graham)为奥雷里(Orrery)伯爵制造，因而称之为Orrery 。后演变为这类仪器的统称。

sentence.Network_en: Rebuild the defiled Orrery and unlock the secrets of this Mages Guild Inner Sanctum.
sentence.Network_cn: 重新建造太阳系隘路与开启魔法公会内部的密室.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: named after the fourth Earl of Orrery, for whom one was made

means.word_mean: 1. planetarium consisting of an apparatus that illustrates the relative positions and motions of bodies in the solar system by rotation and revolution of balls moved by wheelwork; sometimes incorporated in a clock
